ns0:Resource.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.ivoa.net/xml/RegistryInterface/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/registry/RegistryInterface/v1.0/RegistryInterface.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOResource/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VOResource/v1.0/VOResource.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VODataService/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VODataService/v1.0/VODataService.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOTable/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-formats/VOTable/v1.0/VOTable.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ConeSearch/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/ConeSearch/v1.0/ConeSearch.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SIA/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SIA/v1.0/SIA.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SSA/v0.4 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SSA/v0.4/SSA.xsd urn:astrogrid:schema:vo-resource-types:STAP:v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/STAP/v1.0/STAP.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/CEA/v1.0rc1 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/CEAService/v1.0rc1/CEAService.xsd
ns0:Resource.title: ATLAS DR1 - VST ATLAS Survey

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

creator.name: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: survey, galaxy, point source
content.description: This DSA hosts data release 1 of the ATLAS Survey housed at the Wide Field Astronomy Unit at the Univeristy of Edinburgh. The initial aim of ATLAS is to survey 4500 deg2 of the Southern Sky at high galactic latitudes to comparable depths to the SDSS in the North. The VST ATLAS will be the first step towards a panoramic digital survey of the Southern Sky in the optical bands. The ATLAS will complement the proposed VISTA Hemisphere Survey in the South.

capability.description: Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.

table.name: ArchiveCurationHistory
table.description: Contains details of the matrix of the Archives' required curation tasks

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: cuID
column.description: the unique curation task ID

column.name: logFile
column.description: filename of verbose logged task output

column.name: resultsFile
column.description: filename of any results file

column.name: timeStamp
column.description: Time of the completion of the whole task

column.name: curator
column.description: The archive curation scientist responsible for this event

column.name: comment
column.description: Comment string supplied by the curator

column.name: rolledBack
column.description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

table.name: AstrCalVers
table.description: Contains a record for every astrometric calibration version in the archive

column.name: versNum
column.description: Version number of current astrometric solution

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: startDate
column.description: MJD of the start time for this version of the calibration

column.name: endDate
column.description: MJD of the end time for this version of the calibration

table.name: CurationTask
table.description: Contains a list of all curation tasks that are used within the OSA

column.name: cuID
column.description: the unique curation task ID

column.name: description
column.description: description in words for this task

table.name: CurrentAstrometry
table.description: Contains the current astrometric calibration coefficients

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: extNum
column.description: the extension number of this frame

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: distortMap
column.description: filename of 2d non-linear distortion map

column.name: centralRa
column.description: RA (J2000) at device centre

column.name: centralDec
column.description: Dec (J2000) at device centre

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

column.name: htmID
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates of device centre

column.name: posAngle
column.description: orientation of image x-axis to N-S

column.name: l
column.description: Galactic longitude of device centre

column.name: b
column.description: Galactic latitude of device centre

column.name: lambda
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

column.name: eta
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2 of device centre

column.name: imageExtent
column.description: The maximum angular extent from the central position

column.name: minRa
column.description: The minimum RA (J2000) on the device

column.name: minDec
column.description: The minimum Dec (J2000) on the device

column.name: maxRa
column.description: The maximum RA (J2000) on the device

column.name: maxDec
column.description: The maximum Dec (J2000) on the device

column.name: xPixSize
column.description: Angular size of pixels in X

column.name: yPixSize
column.description: Angular size of pixels in Y

table.name: ExternalSurvey
table.description: A list of all externally produced survey products held in the OSA

column.name: surveyID
column.description: the unique identifier for the survey

column.name: surveyName
column.description: The short name of the survey, eg. SDSS-EDR, SDSS-DR1, USNOB etc.

column.name: databaseName
column.description: The name of the database within the OSA

column.name: description
column.description: A brief description of the survey

column.name: imagesLocation
column.description: Pathname to the pixels (eg. for list-driven remeasurement)

table.name: ExternalSurveyTable
table.description: Contains information about the external surveys tables

column.name: surveyID
column.description: the unique identifier for the survey

column.name: extTableID
column.description: the unique table ID

column.name: extTableName
column.description: the name of the table

column.name: sourceIDName
column.description: The source unique identifier in the table

column.name: coord1
column.description: The attribute name of the first (longitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial RA

column.name: coord2
column.description: The attribute name of the second (latitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial Dec

table.name: Filter
table.description: Contains details of the OMEGACAM filters

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

column.name: shortName
column.description: Short identification name for the filter

column.name: name
column.description: The name of the filter, eg. "U_SDSS", "SLOAN Z" etc.

column.name: description
column.description: a concise description of the filter

column.name: cutOn
column.description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

column.name: cutOff
column.description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

column.name: aebv
column.description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

column.name: vegaToAB
column.description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

column.name: oneSecMLVg
column.description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

column.name: isSectioned
column.description: Is the focal plane sectioned into different filters, 0 No, 1 Yes. If so, data for each section in FilterSections and SectionDetectors

table.name: FilterSections
table.description: Contains details of the different sections of sectioned OMEGACAM filters

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

column.name: sectionID
column.description: UID of section of focal plane with different filter

column.name: shortName
column.description: Short identification name for the filter section

column.name: cutOn
column.description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

column.name: cutOff
column.description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

column.name: aebv
column.description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

column.name: vegaToAB
column.description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

column.name: oneSecMLVg
column.description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

table.name: Multiframe
table.description: Contains details of all multiframes stored in the archive

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: UID of the multiframe (assigned sequentially by the archive ingest process)

column.name: vstRunNo
column.description: Original VST Atlas run number (from filename)

column.name: frameType
column.description: The type of multiframe (eg. stack|tile|mosaic|difference|calibration|interleaved etc).

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: julianDayNum
column.description: the Julian Day number of the VST night

column.name: fileTimeStamp
column.description: Time stamp digits (from the original CASU directory name and file time stamp) for enforcing uniqueness

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z)

column.name: project
column.description: Time-allocation code

column.name: utDate
column.description: UT date when this file was written (MM-DD-YYYY)

column.name: numDetectors
column.description: The number of "detectors" (=image extensions in FITS file)

column.name: raMoon
column.description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Right ascension of the Moon

column.name: decMoon
column.description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Declination of the Moon

column.name: illumMoon
column.description: Illumination of the Moon

column.name: raMoonTopo
column.description: Apparent topocentric Right ascension of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

column.name: decMoonTopo
column.description: Apparent topocentric Declination of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

column.name: fileName
column.description: the filename for the multiframe, eg. server:/path/filename.fit

column.name: catName
column.description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

column.name: versionNum
column.description: a version number for this frame (if available)

column.name: deprecated
column.description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe

column.name: newlyIngested
column.description: Curation flag for internal use only (0=no, 1=yes)

column.name: illumFile
column.description: File name of CASU created photometric illumination correction used on catalogue data from this file

column.name: unfilteredID
column.description: UID of original unfiltered frame corresponding to this filtered frame

table.name: MultiframeDetector
table.description: Contains details of individual detector frames that are part of a multiframe

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: extNum
column.description: the extension number of this frame

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: compFile
column.description: Filename of the compressed image of this image frame, eg. server:/path/filename.jpg

column.name: numAxes
column.description: Number of data axes; eg. 2

column.name: deprecated
column.description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe detector

column.name: totalExpTime
column.description: Total exposure time for this detector

table.name: MultiframeDetectorEsoKeys
table.description: Contains details of all hierarchical ESO attributes for secondary HDUs

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: extNum
column.description: the extension number of this frame

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

table.name: MultiframeEsoKeys
table.description: Contains details of all hierarchical ESO attributes for the primary HDU

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

table.name: PhotCalVers
table.description: Contains details of all photometric calibration versions in the OSA

column.name: versNum
column.description: the version number of the calibration

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: startDate
column.description: Date time of start time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

column.name: endDate
column.description: Date time of end time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

table.name: PreviousMFDZP
table.description: Contains previous zeropoints for each multiframe and detector combination

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: extNum
column.description: the extension number of this frame

column.name: versNum
column.description: the version number of the calibration

column.name: photZPCat
column.description: Photometric zeropoint for default extinction in catalogue header

column.name: photZPErrCat
column.description: Photometric zeropoint error in catalogue header

column.name: numZPCat
column.description: Number of standards used in determining photZP and photZPErr

column.name: nightZPCat
column.description: Average photometric zero point for night

column.name: nightZPErrCat
column.description: Photometric zero point sigma for night

column.name: nightZPNum
column.description: Number of ZP in band used to calculate nightZPCat

table.name: ProductLinks
table.description: Contains links between different products, e.g. tiles and stacks, mosaics and tiles, mosaics and stack

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: combiProductID
column.description: Product ID of combination frame

column.name: intProductID
column.description: Product ID of intermediate frame

column.name: combiProdType
column.description: Type (stack,tile,mosaic) of combination frame

column.name: intProdType
column.description: Type (stack,tile,mosaic) of intermediate frame

table.name: Programme
table.description: Contains details of the OMEGACAM observation programmes

column.name: programmeID
column.description: UID of the archived programme coded as above

column.name: title
column.description: a short title for the programme, eg. "ATLAS Survey"

column.name: description
column.description: a concise description of the programme

column.name: reference
column.description: a reference for the programme, eg. "http://www.ukidss.org/surveys/surveys.html"

column.name: propPeriod
column.description: the proprietory period for any data taken for this programme in months, e.g. 12 for open time.

column.name: dfsIDString
column.description: The description used within the data flow system (ie. the value of the appropriate FITS keyword)

column.name: catalogueSchema
column.description: Script file that describes the catalogue schema

column.name: detectionTable
column.description: Table name of detections

column.name: sourceTable
column.description: Table name of merged sources

column.name: listRemeasTable
column.description: Table name of individual passband list re-measurements

column.name: sourceRemeasTable
column.description: Table name of co-located list re-measurements

column.name: mergeLogTable
column.description: Table name of curation log for source merging

column.name: frameSetTolerance
column.description: The match tolerance for different passband frames

column.name: pairingCriterion
column.description: The pairing criterion for associating detections into merged sources

column.name: adjacentFrameTolerance
column.description: The match tolerance for adjacent frames in the survey

column.name: neighboursSchema
column.description: Script file that describes the neighbour tables schema for this programme

column.name: synopticSourceTable
column.description: Table name of merged variable sources

column.name: synopticBestMatchTable
column.description: Table name of merged variable sources

column.name: variabilityTable
column.description: Table name of merged variable sources

column.name: mosaicTool
column.description: Name of mosaicing tool to be used

column.name: extractTool
column.description: Name of extraction tool to be used

column.name: bandMergingCriterion
column.description: maximum timespan over which different filters are merged into sources in the synoptic source table.

column.name: isLowGalacticLat
column.description: Is this a low Galactic latitude field where Schlegel maps don't work (No=0/Yes=1)

column.name: sourceProdType
column.description: The product type to be used to create the source table. (stack, tile, mosaic)

column.name: epochFrameType
column.description: The frame type to be used for each epoch (stack, tile)

column.name: posAngleTolerance
column.description: The position angle tolerance used when creating deep stacks and tiles

column.name: synopticSetUp
column.description: A string describing the synoptic setup for more complicated surveys

table.name: ProgrammeCurationHistory
table.description: Contains details of the matrix of programmes and required curation tasks

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: timeStamp
column.description: Time of individual programme curation completion

column.name: status
column.description: successful (1) or unsuccessful (0)

table.name: ProgrammeFrame
table.description: Contains details of which image(s) belong to which Programme(s

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: ppErrBitsStatus
column.description: Bit flag to denote whether detection quality flagging has been done on this multiframe for this programme.

table.name: ProgrammeTable
table.description: Contains details of the set of curated tables for each programme

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: tableID
column.description: the unique table ID

column.name: tableName
column.description: the name of the table

column.name: sourceIDName
column.description: the name of the source

table.name: Provenance
table.description: Describes the provenance of all combined frames in the archive

column.name: combiframeID
column.description: the UID of the combined frame (=combiframe)

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the component frame

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

table.name: Release
table.description: Contains the release details for a survey curated within the OSA

column.name: surveyID
column.description: the unique identifier for the survey

column.name: releaseNum
column.description: the release number

column.name: releaseDate
column.description: the release date

column.name: description
column.description: a brief description of the release

column.name: dbName
column.description: the name of the SQL Server database containing this release

table.name: RequiredDiffImage
table.description: Contains details of default difference image products curated in the archive

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: productID
column.description: A unique identifier assigned to each required difference image product entry

column.name: filter1
column.description: UID of OMEGACAM narrow band (primary) filter

column.name: filter2
column.description: UID of OMEGACAM broad band (reference) filter to be subtracted

column.name: wcs
column.description: CASU difference image tool option to specify use of implicit WCS in the input files (y/n; recommended value=y)

column.name: method
column.description: CASU difference image tool option string specifying the method to employ (recommended value=adaptive/back/zerosky)

table.name: RequiredFilters
table.description: Contains required filters used for every programme held in the OSA

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

column.name: nPass
column.description: the number of passes that will be made

column.name: isSynoptic
column.description: is the band observed multiple times for variability measurements (0 FALSE, 1 TRUE)

table.name: RequiredListDrivenProduct
table.description: Contains programmes/surveys required for list-driven co-located photometry

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: tableID
column.description: the unique ID of the table with the source list driving the remeasurements

column.name: surveyID
column.description: the unique ID of the external survey (if applicable)

column.name: transFile
column.description: CASU list-driven photometry tool option specifying the source of the driving list (e.g. "use=radeclist")

column.name: aperture
column.description: CASU list-driven photometry tool option specifying the fixed radius to be used for photometry

table.name: RequiredNeighbours
table.description: Details programmes/survey tables that have default joins within the OSA

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: tableID
column.description: the unique identifier for the programme table

column.name: surveyID
column.description: the unique identifier for the survey

column.name: extTableID
column.description: the unique table ID

column.name: joinCriterion
column.description: the join criterion (search radius for matches)

column.name: neighbourTable
column.description: the name of the neighbour join table

column.name: extProgID
column.description: the unique programme ID for second table if there are multiple programmes in the neighbour survey

table.name: RequiredStack
table.description: Contains details of default stack image products curated in the archive

column.name: programmeID
column.description: the unique programme ID

column.name: productID
column.description: A unique identifier assigned to each required stack product entry

column.name: name
column.description: Name of the stacked product

column.name: description
column.description: Description of the product

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

column.name: ra
column.description: Right Ascension of stack centre

column.name: dec
column.description: Declination of stack centre

column.name: numberStk
column.description: Number of intermediate stacks. If default, stack all good quality stacks

column.name: stackRadius
column.description: radius within which intermediate stacks are selected for this deep stack.

column.name: fieldID
column.description: UID of position on sky.

column.name: posAngle
column.description: Orientation of image x-axis to N-S

table.name: SectionDetectors
table.description: Gives which detectors correspond to different sections of sectioned OMEGACAM filters

column.name: sectionID
column.description: UID of section of focal plane with different filter

column.name: camNum
column.description: UID of camera detector

column.name: magazine
column.description: Name of magazine A,B, see insFilt1No in MultiframeEsoKeys

table.name: StdFieldInfo
table.description: Contains details of Standard Fields used to calibrate WFCAM and VISTA observations

column.name: fieldID
column.description: The fieldID is a UID identifying each of the 43 standard fields that are observed as part of the calibration observations

column.name: raCentre
column.description: Right Ascension of field centre

column.name: decCentre
column.description: Declination of field centre

column.name: fieldName
column.description: reference name of field

column.name: observed
column.description: yes or no identifier - have the secondary standards been set up?

table.name: Survey
table.description: Contains information about the curated surveys within the OSA

column.name: surveyID
column.description: The unique identifier for the curated survey

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for the survey

column.name: description
column.description: A concise description of the survey

column.name: dbNamePrefix
column.description: A string that prefixes all database names released for this survey

column.name: proprietary
column.description: Logical flag indicating whether a survey is proprietary or not (1=yes; 0=no)

table.name: SurveyProgrammes
table.description: Contains details of which programme(s) belong to which survey(s

column.name: surveyID
column.description: The unique identifier for the curated survey

column.name: delPropData
column.description: Logical flag indicating that proprietary data should be removed on release (1=yes; 0=no)

table.name: atlasDetection
table.description: Contains the individual ATLAS source detections for each frame

column.name: multiframeID
column.description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

column.name: extNum
column.description: the extension number of this frame

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: filterID
column.description: UID of combined filter (assigned in VSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=Ks,8=blank)

column.name: isoMag
column.description: Calibrated isophotal magnitude

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr1
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag1
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag1err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr2
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag2
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 2

column.name: aperMag2err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 2

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr3
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag3
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 3. aperMag3 has also a saturation correction applied for saturated stars.

column.name: aperMag3err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 3

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr4
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag4
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 4

column.name: aperMag4err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 4

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr5
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag5
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 5

column.name: aperMag5err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 5

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr6
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag6
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 6

column.name: aperMag6err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 6

column.name: aperMagNoAperCorr7
column.description: Calibrated and standard corrected (but no aperture correction applied) aperture magnitude 1

column.name: aperMag7
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 7

column.name: aperMag7err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 7

column.name: aperMag8
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 8. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag8err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 8

column.name: aperMag9
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 9. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag9err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 9

column.name: aperMag10
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 10. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag10err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 10

column.name: aperMag11
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 11. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag11err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 11

column.name: aperMag12
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 12. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag12err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 12

column.name: aperMag13
column.description: Calibrated and corrected aperture magnitude 13. No aperture correction applied since it is 0.

column.name: aperMag13err
column.description: Error in calibrated aperture magnitude 13

column.name: hlCircRadAs
column.description: Circular half-light radius computed from curve of growth assuming petrosian flux is 90% of total

column.name: hlCircRadErrAs
column.description: Error in hlCircRadAs

column.name: hlGeoRadAs
column.description: Geometric half-light radius

column.description: Half-light semi-major axis

column.name: hlCorSMnRadAs
column.description: Seeing corrected Half-light semi-minor axis

column.name: hlCorSMjRadAs
column.description: Seeing corrected Half-light semi-major axis

column.name: petroMag
column.description: Calibrated Petrosian magnitude within circular aperture r_p

column.name: petroMagErr
column.description: error on calibrated Petrosian magnitude

column.name: kronMag
column.description: Calibrated Kron magnitude within circular aperture r_k

column.name: kronMagErr
column.description: error on calibrated Kron magnitude

column.name: halfMag
column.description: Calibrated magnitude within circular aperture halfRad

column.name: halfMagErr
column.description: Calibrated error on Half magnitude

column.name: ra
column.description: Celestial Right Ascension

column.name: dec
column.description: Celestial Declination

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: htmID
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

column.name: l
column.description: Galactic longitude

column.name: b
column.description: Galactic latitude

column.name: lambda
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1

column.name: eta
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

column.name: psfMag
column.description: PSF-fitted calibrated magnitude

column.name: psfMagErr
column.description: Error on PSF-fitted calibrated magnitude

column.name: SerMag1D
column.description: Calibrated 1D Sersic flux

column.name: SerMag2D
column.description: Calibrated 2D Sersic flux

column.name: deltaMag
column.description: sum of magnitude corrections for faster processing

column.name: illumCorr
column.description: illumination correction

column.name: distortCorr
column.description: distortion correction

column.name: saturatCorr
column.description: saturation correction

column.name: ppErrBits
column.description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits

column.name: deprecated
column.description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) detection

column.name: objID
column.description: Unique identifier for this detection or default for no detection

table.name: atlasMergeLog
table.description: Contains frame set details of merged ATLAS MultiframeDetector images

column.name: frameSetID
column.description: frame set ID, unique over the whole VSA via programme ID prefix, assigned by merging procedure

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: ra
column.description: Right Ascension of field centre

column.name: dec
column.description: Declination of field centre

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: htmID
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

column.name: umfID
column.description: the UID of the relevant U multiframe

column.name: ueNum
column.description: the extension number of this U frame

column.name: newUframe
column.description: new/old flag (1/0) of this detector image

column.name: listProcU
column.description: Frame has been list processed (0=no; 1=yes)

column.name: gmfID
column.description: the UID of the relevant G multiframe

column.name: geNum
column.description: the extension number of this G frame

column.name: newGframe
column.description: new/old flag (1/0) of this detector image

column.name: listProcG
column.description: Frame has been list processed (0=no; 1=yes)

column.name: rmfID
column.description: the UID of the relevant R multiframe

column.name: reNum
column.description: the extension number of this R frame

column.name: newRframe
column.description: new/old flag (1/0) of this detector image

column.name: listProcR
column.description: Frame has been list processed (0=no; 1=yes)

column.name: imfID
column.description: the UID of the relevant I multiframe

column.name: ieNum
column.description: the extension number of this I frame

column.name: newIframe
column.description: new/old flag (1/0) of this detector image

column.name: listProcI
column.description: Frame has been list processed (0=no; 1=yes)

column.name: zmfID
column.description: the UID of the relevant Z multiframe

column.name: zeNum
column.description: the extension number of this Z frame

column.name: newZframe
column.description: new/old flag (1/0) of this detector image

column.name: listProcZ
column.description: Frame has been list processed (0=no; 1=yes)

column.name: mergeSwVersion
column.description: version number of the software used to merge the frames

column.name: newFrameSet
column.description: Flag used internally by curation applications

column.name: deprecated
column.description: frame set deprecation flag (1=deprecated)

table.name: atlasSource
table.description: Contains merged sources from detections in atlasDetection

column.name: sourceID
column.description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

column.name: cuEventID
column.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

column.name: frameSetID
column.description: UID of the set of frames that this merged source comes from

column.name: ra
column.description: Celestial Right Ascension

column.name: dec
column.description: Celestial Declination

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: htmID
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

column.name: l
column.description: Galactic longitude

column.name: b
column.description: Galactic latitude

column.name: lambda
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1

column.name: eta
column.description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

column.name: priOrSec
column.description: Seam code for a unique (=0) or duplicated (!=0) source (eg. flags overlap duplicates).

column.name: umgPnt
column.description: Point source colour U-G (using aperMag3)

column.name: umgPntErr
column.description: Error on point source colour U-G

column.name: gmrPnt
column.description: Point source colour G-R (using aperMag3)

column.name: gmrPntErr
column.description: Error on point source colour G-R

column.name: rmiPnt
column.description: Point source colour R-I (using aperMag3)

column.name: rmiPntErr
column.description: Error on point source colour R-I

column.name: imzPnt
column.description: Point source colour I-Z (using aperMag3)

column.name: imzPntErr
column.description: Error on point source colour I-Z

column.name: umgExt
column.description: Extended source colour U-G (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

column.name: umgExtErr
column.description: Error on extended source colour U-G

column.name: gmrExt
column.description: Extended source colour G-R (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

column.name: gmrExtErr
column.description: Error on extended source colour G-R

column.name: rmiExt
column.description: Extended source colour R-I (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

column.name: rmiExtErr
column.description: Error on extended source colour R-I

column.name: imzExt
column.description: Extended source colour I-Z (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

column.name: imzExtErr
column.description: Error on extended source colour I-Z

column.name: mergedClassStat
column.description: Merged N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic

column.name: mergedClass
column.description: Class flag from available measurements (1|0|-1|-2|-3|-9=galaxy|noise|stellar|probableStar|probableGalaxy|saturated)

column.name: pStar
column.description: Probability that the source is a star

column.name: pGalaxy
column.description: Probability that the source is a galaxy

column.name: pNoise
column.description: Probability that the source is noise

column.name: pSaturated
column.description: Probability that the source is saturated

column.name: eBV
column.description: The galactic dust extinction value measured from the Schlegel, Finkbeiner & Davis (1998) maps. This uses the correction given in Bonifacio, Monai & Beers (2000). This correction reduces the extinction value in regions of high extinction (E(B-V)>0.1)

column.name: aU
column.description: The galactic extinction correction in the U band for extragalactic objects

column.name: aG
column.description: The galactic extinction correction in the G band for extragalactic objects

column.name: aR
column.description: The galactic extinction correction in the R band for extragalactic objects

column.name: aI
column.description: The galactic extinction correction in the I band for extragalactic objects

column.name: aZ
column.description: The galactic extinction correction in the Z band for extragalactic objects

column.name: uPetroMag
column.description: Extended source U mag (Petrosian)

column.name: uPetroMagErr
column.description: Error in extended source U mag (Petrosian)

column.name: uPsfMag
column.description: Point source profile-fitted U mag

column.name: uPsfMagErr
column.description: Error in point source profile-fitted U mag

column.name: uSerMag2D
column.description: Extended source U mag (profile-fitted)

column.name: uSerMag2DErr
column.description: Error in extended source U mag (profile-fitted)

column.name: uAperMag3
column.description: Default point source U aperture corrected mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMag3Err
column.description: Error in default point/extended source U mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMag4
column.description: Point source U aperture corrected mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMag4Err
column.description: Error in point/extended source U mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMag6
column.description: Point source U aperture corrected mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMag6Err
column.description: Error in point/extended source U mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMagNoAperCorr3
column.description: Default extended source U aperture mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMagNoAperCorr4
column.description: Extended source U aperture mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uAperMagNoAperCorr6
column.description: Extended source U aperture mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

column.name: uHlCorSMjRadAs
column.description: Seeing corrected half-light, semi-major axis in U band

column.name: uGausig
column.description: RMS of axes of ellipse fit in U

column.name: uEll
column.description: 1-b/a, where a/b=semi-major/minor axes in U

column.name: uPA
column.description: ellipse fit celestial orientation in U

column.name: uErrBits
column.description: processing warning/error bitwise flags in U

column.name: uAverageConf
column.description: average confidence in 2 arcsec diameter default aperture (aper3) U

column.name: uClass
column.description: discrete image classification flag in U

column.name: uClassStat
column.description: N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic in U

column.name: uppErrBits
column.description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits in U

column.name: uSeqNum
column.description: the running number of the U detection

column.name: uXi
column.description: Offset of U detection from master position (+east/-west)

column.name: uEta
column.description: Offset of U detection from master position (+north/-south)

table.name: atlasSourceNeighbours
table.description: Neighbouring sources for each entry in atlasSource

column.name: masterObjID
column.description: The unique ID in atlasSource (=sourceID)

column.name: slaveObjID
column.description: The unique ID of the neighbour in atlasSource (=sourceID)

column.name: distanceMins
column.description: Angular separation between neighbours

column.description: Angular separation between neighbours

column.name: sdssType
column.description: SDSS type of neighbour: 3=galaxy; 6=star

column.name: sdssPrimary
column.description: SDSS flag for neighbour being primary (1) or secondary (0)

table.name: ukirtFSstars
table.description: Contains UKIRT Faint Standards observed for calibration observations

column.name: objID
column.description: Faint standard unique identifier (FS number; see Hawarden et al. 2001, MN, 325, 563)

column.name: name
column.description: reference name of field

column.name: ra
column.description: Right Ascension of star at Equinox J2000.0

column.name: dec
column.description: Declination of star at Equinox J2000.0

column.name: pmRA
column.description: Proper motion in RA

column.name: pmDec
column.description: Proper motion in Dec

column.name: epoch
column.description: The epoch of columns ra and dec

column.name: bMag
column.description: B band total magnitude

column.name: vMag
column.description: V band total magnitude

column.name: iMag
column.description: I band total magnitude

column.name: jMag
column.description: J band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system

column.name: jMagErr
column.description: J band magnitude error

column.name: hMag
column.description: H band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system

column.name: hMagErr
column.description: H band magnitude error

column.name: kMag
column.description: K band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system

column.name: kMagErr
column.description: K band magnitude error
